We love families - children up to 12 years are free of charge.

Within a few minutes are some of the nicest bars, cafés and restaurants in the city. Kreuzberg and Görlitzer Park is a 10 min walk away. Well connected to the rest of the city and suitable for traveling families and backpackers alike.

Located in the center of Berlin-Pankow, in close proximity to S+U-Bahn, bus + tram, shops and restaurants, you are in the city center in no time. The apartment is located in a quiet side street and has a wide view over a park in front of the house.

description:
Welcome to my charming Berlin studio! Tucked away in the heart of Kreuzberg, my apartment may be small, but it exudes cozy comfort. It's the ideal retreat for couples or solo travelers seeking a blend of simplicity and comfort.

The apartment is situated in a perfect location of Berlin- Kreuzberg. The closest metro station is 200 m away. It's surrounded by colourful cafes, restaurants, parks and a river. From here you get easy access to many destinations.

name: Above the clouds in Berlin's Center | 1 Room
description:
Directly downtown: Gendarmenmarkt, Friedrichstraße and Checkpoint Charlie are very close. Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz the Kreuzberg quarter are in close proximity to this room.
Central underground line (U2), Metro-Bus- and Tram connections are easy to reach. Both airports as well as the central station are accessible quickly and comfortably. A supermarked, bakery store and late-night shop with bicycle rental are close. Best suitable for couples, adventurers and business guests.

name: Charmantes Apartment mit Flair und Stil (74 m2)
description:
We have furnished our quiet, stylishly renovated and centrally located old building apartment with passion. The combination of old and new, from design and own creations, makes it an extraordinary place of relaxation and creativity.
The high stucco ceilings and 74m² of space give it a spacious flair. The living room is open to the kitchen and has an exit to the small balcony.
The cozy bedroom has a box spring bed (1.60 x 2m) and an en-suite shower.

name: Hazy Palms Hotel-Apartment Prenzlauer Berg
description: Located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg - one of the most popular districts in Berlin - we offer urban comfort in modern but cosy spaces with a dream like atmosphere. Through choice of organic materials, colors and themes we integrate nature and landscapes into our contemporary spaces which accommodate 2-4 travelers each in two separate double bed rooms. The main focus here lies on an exceptional sleeping experience best ever tested mattress, memory foam toppers and a selection of pillows.

All in all this is a place to lay back in comfort and enjoy life.

The room has one big bed for two and one couch bed for one person.
The studio is for maximum 3 people.
The apartment has two floor, the studio is in first one and we live in the second. 8min walking from the public transport ,Location Kreuzberg.

name: bright, cosy studio with wooden floor in Altbau
description:
It's a nice single flat in a Altbau building with high ceiling, wooden floor and south facing windows, located in the backyard, quiet and bright. Minimal decorated and also used as tearoom.
Near Schiller Park, 7 min to U6/Tram13 Seetrasse, 2 min to Bus 120.
Plenty of supermarkets around such as Edeka, Denns Biomarket, Asian Market Vinh-Loi, DM, and Turkish shops and great restaurants .
If you are a cinema fan, City-Kino Wedding offers a good programm in the neighborhood as well:)

name: Convenient room in best area
description:
Peaceful room in charming Prenzlauer Berg (and one street away from Mitte), this rental room offers a tranquil haven where you can unwind and recharge.

Large windows invite ample natural light, illuminating the space and creating a soothing atmosphere. Our new 140x200 sofa-bed is medium firm and comfortable. At our same building you find a supermarket.

Prenzlauer Berg is known for its tree-lined streets, picturesque parks, and a delightful blend of local cafes and boutiques.

description: Right in the middle of Berlin between Prenzlauerberg and Mitte you have the opportunity to rent this beautiful cozy apartment. From here you can easily reach everything on foot or take the subway U8, located directly in front of the door, to get to Neukölln or Kreuzberg easily.

description:

It's a sunny duplex loft in beautiful Schillerkiez, with private terrace facing south , right next door to Tempelhofer Feld. The newly furnished 125m2 apartment has 2 floors: open kitchen and living room, one private bedroom, big bathroom on the ground floor; open loft with double bed, toilet shower and a terrace upstairs.

description:
The sunny 17 m² room is situated in the district of Prenzlauer Berg, just 15 min away from Alexanderplatz and the city centre by tram. Supermarkets are close to the flat and the tram station is just 3 min away on foot.

The sunny 17m² room is located in the Berlin district of Prenzlauer Berg, only 15 minutes away from Alexanderplatz and the city center by tram. Supermarkets are in the immediate vicinity and the tram stop is only a 3-minute walk away.

name: Sonniges Haus mit Garten und Terrasse
description:
You will stay in a modern, comfortable house with a beautiful view into the green garden. In summertime you would like to start your day with a coffee on the upper terrasse, then having a breakfast in the garden before you start by bus, train (S-Bahn) to your sightseeing in Berlin: Kurfürstendamm, "Unter den Linden", Potsdamer Platz, "Das Stadtschloss".

You will stay in a family home that is striktly non smoking.

We are happy to welcome you soon.

Katharina

name: Bright apartment in central Berlin
description:
Comfortable (60sqm), newly renovated and well maintained flat, very bright, located in the charming district of Prenzlauer Berg. Optimal location (1.5 km from Alexander Platz) and very convenient for getting around and visiting the city.

The flat consists of an open kitchen and living room with a comfortable double sofa bed and a roomy bedroom with a double bed and a work desk area.

Bathroom with a spacious shower.

Nice and quiet area with plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: Chic Flat | City View | Subway | Café | River
description: Welcome to this stunning, newly renovated Altbau apartment in the heart of Berlin! Located on the iconic Friedrichstraße, this spacious 80 m² apartment accommodates up to 4 guests. With its high ceilings, large windows, and elegant design, the space boasts a bright and airy atmosphere, complemented by breathtaking views of the vibrant city.

name: Stunning waterside apartment in vibrant Kreuzberg
description:
Enjoy an unforgettable stay in my lovely apartment close to a charming canal in one of Berlins most vibrant neighbourhoods.
The apartment offers you a cosy base and a feeling of home during your visit to Berlin.
It is located in a lively area in the heart of Kreuzberg where you can get a glimpse of the Berlin vibe. A huge selection of restaurants, bars, vintage clothing stores, cafes, bakeries, and much more is on your doorstep.

name: ♥♥Close to Estrel Congress/ BER / Mercedes Arena♥♥
description: I offer you here a large, cozy and furnished private room. You will have your own keys. You live in the famous Neukölln and have a great starting position for your Berlin Adventure. The Apartement is located in a quiet place and you have a awesome view from your room. I will do everything that u feel comfortable in my apartement. Hospitality is for me very important. See you soon in Berlin

name: Pure  & Spacious Zen room in Neukölln Center
description:
Central Neukölln, super convenient and international area. This is Berlin's most hip and most cosmopolitan area.

Subway and a shopping center are in a minute. Cafes are everywhere and there are famous big parks for jogging, beautiful canals, big flea market, vintage second hand shops, movie theaters in walking distance.

It is very central yet in a quiet neighborhood.

Check in time could be sometimes negotiable. Please ask!

name: Wohnen auf Zeit- Bergmannkiez
description: You can't live more centrally in Berlin. The property is within walking distance of Potsdamer Platz, Unter den Linden and Bergmannstraße - the Ku'damm of Kreuzberg. In a few minutes you can reach the main underground stations that run throughout the city. Rents for a long-term stay up to 6 weeks max.

Just around the corner you will find this newly refurbished 2 room apartment. It's fully equiped and located in the backyard of an early 20th century building complex.

Within a short walk you have access to the public transportation (U8 and several trams).

Also 10 minutes to tram stop of the M10, which goes directly to the main train station.

Various bus lines can also be reached in the nearby Turmstraße.

Weißensee is about 20 minutes from the center.

It is right opposite a park with beautiful trees. Within 200 metres you find two playgrounds, a skate park, two sports pitches, tennis courts, a beach volleyball court, table tennis tables, two ice-cream parlours, a beer garden, a cinema and good coffee joints.

Only a few bus stops away from the centre this flat is the perfect base to chill out after sightseeing.

description:

Immerse yourself in history at Checkpoint Charlie, soak up the vibrant atmosphere at Alexanderplatz, explore the cultural wonders of Museum Island. Enjoy shopping sprees at nearby malls and the charm of Gendarmenmarkt, all just moments from your doorstep. A short distance away, you’ll find the Uber Arena,where the biggest concerts and sports championships take place.
Create memories with us

It is located in a typical Berlin old building with high ceilings (3.40m) and was recently stylishly renovated and furnished. The apartment is perfect for couples, small families (even with small children) or business travelers.

This exquisite apartment, on the 6th floor of a newly constructed luxury elevator building, invites you to indulge in the splendor of a bright, tastefully furnished and large private bedroom and private bathroom with a dedicated desk for comfortable work.

Our attic apartment has a warm atmosphere with windows in all directions. Four of us live here and we try to give our guests a family feeling. We would like you to feel welcome and at home.

Welcome to our cosy holiday suite in southeast Berlin next to a forest fantastic for walks and cycling. You can also take a swim from a nearby private beach. Berlin's public transport is close by. Breakfast is optional.

The apartment, which was renovated in May 2019, is located on the 3rd floor in the quiet side wing of a Berlin Wilhelminian period house built in 1900.

name: Spacious cosy room in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Large room in the heart of Kreuzberg on the 4th floor of an old building. Maybachufer is a 5-minute walk away and there is a large selection of cafes, restaurants, bars and weekly markets in the immediate vicinity. You can reach Tempelhofer Feld in 15 minutes by bike. The apartment is pleasant, bright with lots of plants.

Public transport: M29 on the doorstep, U1/U3 5 minutes, U8 10 minutes on foot. There are also shopping opportunities within walking distance. There’s an ATM just downstairs.

The apartments are spacious and furnished with careful attention to detail, exuding an artistic flair and timeless elegance. It's not just a place to stay; it's your own slice of life in the heart of Berlin.

description:

In almost all rooms I have removed the wallpaper (some of it is still in progress), revealing decades-old surfaces that let you breathe history. The old floor and a lot of old or shabby look furniture add to that atmosphere

I live there most of the time and I am still renovating and decorating. So it's not completely "finished" yet, but yet has an incredible Charme.

Perfectly connected by public transport, it's an ideal base for exploring Berlin's heart. Experience the unique blend of tranquility and urban life in our special refuge.

Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. 2 bedroom apartment with open layout and modern furnishings. Full kitchen with island, master bedroom, bathroom, and second bedroom with office that can sleep up to 2. Private balcony with spectacular views of the Alexanderturm.
Perfectly located in central Berlin in a quiet residential area near Vollkspark Friedrichshain. Supermarket and restaurants within a few blocks. Only minutes from public transportation and 2 stops from Alexanderplatz

name: Zimmer in Altbau am Helmholtz Platz
description: Nice large room in a good location, very suitable for one to three people.

name: Sonniger Wohnraum mit Balkon
description: A sunny living space in the heart of Friedrichshain with a balcony & view of the countryside. In the middle of the Samariterkiez, the northern and slightly quieter part of Friedrichshain. Cozy bars, coffees & restaurant are all around. The transport connection is optimal with the Ringbahn and the U5  for expeditions to the city.

name: Sunny penthouse apartment
description: Our lovely penthouse apartment is located in the center of Berlin. In the direct surroundings you can find the Bergmannstraße, four beautiful parks and the Tempelhofer Feld. In the apartment and on its roof, you can enjoy a wonderful view over Berlin.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer, Arkonaplatz
description:
A cozy guest room in one of the most beautiful districts of Berlin.
In the middle of it, but quiet, between Mauerpark and Kastanienallee you (you) warmly welcome open-minded, artistic hosts.
The apartment is located in a beautifully renovated old building on the 4th floor and is therefore bright and authentic with a tasteful decor.

name: gemütlich und zentral gelegen
description: There are numerous cafes, bars and restaurants in the area. A supermarket and an organic market right outside the front door. Tram and S-Bahn within walking distance.

name: Naturnah - Berlin by nature - Berlin
description:
Stay like Michel from Lönneberga.
~~~~
Lovingly renovated holiday cottage, bathroom & kitchen in the large garden.
My swimming lake invites you to the morning bath.
City-West/ East in just under 20 (train)


I am very♿️🧑‍🦯🦮🧏‍♂️
sorry my place is not accessible, yet I would do everything to make stays possible for every person on request!


Find a place, loved by Astrid Lindgren
~~~~

name: Sweet cozy apartment-with parking space by request
description: A sweet, bright 1-room apartment to feel good in! Quiet & very green, despite being located in the middle of the lively & lovelyPrenzlauer Berg with many cafés, restaurants, small designer shops. In 8 minutes by tram to Alexanderplatz - the centre of East Berlin.  Perfect for couples, also with child, cot and high chair are available. Cleanliness is very important to me, so we clean carefully after every guest. The apartment is part of my flat with its own entrance, bathroom and kitchen area :)

name: Quiet, cute 2-room flat on canal
description: Quiet escape in one of the best neighborhoods in Europe! Centrally located 2 minutes from the canal in Neukölln (Reuterkiez), my apartment is in the middle of one of the most beloved spots in Berlin. Surrounded by cute restaurants, bars, and vintage shops, I love to share it with people who appreciate the neighborhood. Only the bedroom is for rent (per German law), but if I’m away (often the case when I list it as available - will confirm), you can use the living room during your stay.

name: Gemütliches Apartment mit Balkon und Parkplatz
description:
The apartment is in the north of Berlin in a very green and stylish residential area. A top equipped, modern and cozy apartment with sun balcony on the second floor awaits you.

The apartment has 2 rooms on 43 sqm of living space and therefore plenty of space for 2 people. There is also a covered parking space with barrier directly at the property.

name: Barrierefreie Ferienwohnung mit Terrasse
description:
Our vacation rental is accessible
and is located directly at the Adlershof landscape park.
A supermarket and a bakery are about 200 m away. The BAB highway can be reached in a few minutes and the airport BER is about 15 minutes away by car.
Nevertheless, the apartment is quiet.
It's on a play street, and a charging option for electric cars is right outside the door.
In our residential area there is always one parking space.
High chair and travel cot.

name: 3 Bedroom & 90qm Apartment in Charlottenburg
description:
BENSIMON apartments Berlin Charlottenburg:

In the heart of Berlin you will find this modern designed apartment (90sqm) with the flair of a gallery. The apartment has three separate bedrooms. The airport BER and the Central Station are easy to reach, easy accessible from all parts of Berlin. In the neighbourhood of the apartment you will find beautiful restaurants, unique bars and a variety of shopping opportunities.

The check in is done online and contactless.

description: In my apartment you will find your own furnished room with all you need. Bed, closet, desk. Ideal for retreat after an eventful day. The bathroom is shared with me, as well as the kitchen and the spacious living room with southwest balcony and views over the city. In summer I like to grill here with friends or enjoy a glass of wine in the evening. Your room is quiet to the backyard, perfect for relaxing, even if you live in the middle of the vibrant Kreuzberg.

name: Berlin Friedrichshain Design Loft Wohnung + Garten
description: My loft-like apartment (40 sqm) in Friedrichshain and the associated garden with terrace (20sqm) are located in a quiet back house. Super central & right in the middle - right in the Simon-Dach neighborhood, around the corner of Boxhagener Platz and the raw grounds. I furnished it with a lot of love for detail and with high-quality design highlights - a small oasis of well-being. Outside the door you will find everything you need - international restaurants, bars, cafes, late night shops and many small design shops.

name: Remise mit Charme
description: The apartment is located in a newly renovated remise from 1900 in Berlin. The house can be accessed via the front building at Mittenwalderstrasse 8 and is located in the quiet courtyard. The 70sqm apartment is located on the first floor and is accessiblevia a staircase. The heart piece is the large, bright kitchen with generous equipment and a dining area.

Supermarkets, cafes, restaurants, as well as a shopping center and a quaint market hall from old times are a few minutes' walk away.
The apartment is on the 4th floor.
Unfortunately, there is no elevator

This charming and fully equiped 2 room apartment is located in the quiet backyard of an early 20th century building in the heart of Berlin.

It's freshly renovated and provides you with everything you need: A livingroom with a sofa, a seating area with vintage chairs, a seperate bedroom for two, a modern fitted black kitchen with a micowave and a two field ceran hop, as well as a bathroom with a shower.

•Enjoy cafes, restaurants, boutiques and art galleries.

name: Spacious City Apartment
description: Welcome to your stylish city apartment in the heart of Berlin Neukölln! The modern ambiance combines contemporary design with Berlin charm. Whether it's a weekend trip or a long stay, here you can relax, work, or explore the vibrant Schillerkiez around Tempelhofer Feld. You're well-connected too: With the U8, you'll reach Alexanderplatz in just a few minutes.

name: comfortable houseboat near the city
description: "It's so cozy" - say many guests. "You sit comfortably and can look at the water for hours and enjoy the peace and quiet." The houseboat is very spacious and comfortably equipped. Fireplace in winter, stargazing on the roof terrace in summer. Relax in the rocking chair or write a book in peace? Everything is possible. Enough space for 2 to 4 people to have a wonderful time.

One can use the facilities for locking up the bicycle on the property. Unfortunately, the garden cannot be used, as it is reserved for tenants of the house. Free parking spaces can often be used in front of the house. The apartment is ideally suited for 2 adults and 2 children.

description: Spacious attic apartment with great terrace for relaxing in the government district in Berlin Mitte. Centrally located and quiet. Very stylish and modern furnished with open kitchen/living and dining area. Two double beds, one of them in the gallery open to the living room with spiral staircase. The other one in a separat bedroom.

description: The apartment is located in the beautiful district of Friedrichshagen,  in the eastern part of the capital. It is lovingly, comfortably and is fully equipped. Guests can enjoy a special atmosphere. Surrounded by forest, water, the largest lake in Berlin - the Müggelsee - and an  interesting promenade , the Bölschstrasse,  with excellent opportunities to linger , good food and shopping - here simply no vacation is unfulfilled.

name: Lovely room in Berlin Schöneberg
description:
The room is located in a 4-person shared apartment (22-28 years old) in Berlin-Schöneberg but max. 3 roommates will be there during your stay. It is a bright room of approximately 14 square meters, furnished with a desk, a double bed and a wardrobe. The apartment has 1 large living room, 2 bathrooms and a kitchen that can be used by everyone.

Since this is a WG (shared apartment) of students and young people, please keep in mind that it won't be at hotel standards :)

Great converted bakery conveniently located in Prenzlauerberg.

Ground floor loft with 90sqm of space that has recently been refurbished.

There is a open plan kitchen with breakfast bar.

It flat has two bedrooms: a master with king bed and bedframe, and a regular double and bedframe in the second bedroom.

There is a further double bed in the common areas.

The full apartment is situated through the main entrance, along a small cobbled path and is access through a private front door of a courtyard garden on ground floor.

Ivo will meet you and show you around the apartment.

Prenzlauerberg is an attraction in itself, famous for its cafe culture and small galleries on stargarder Str, Arnim Platz

name: Charming loft in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Our charming loft is reminiscent of old times of West Berlin. 200 sqm as you can hardly find it today. It sits in the center of the beautiful Kreuzberg 61- Kiez. The loft is in the backyard, so we are away from the noisy street noise, but if we can dive out immediately. My 12 year old son Bruno and I live here and are always very much looking forward to international exchange and guests.
Language: German, English, Italian, French

name: City Apartment am Alexanderplatz
description: 2-room apartment in Berlin-Mitte, near Alexanderplatz and Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz. Exclusive amenities with bathtub, TV, Wi-Fi. Very quiet bedroom to the green courtyard. Parking space in the underground garage for 10€ per day. Elevator available.

name: Charming Apartment near Mauerpark
description: Our freshly renovated apartment in the heart of the famous district Prenzlauer Berg offers you the true Berlin feeling: located in a charming old building on a cobbled street, famous historic sites and beautiful cafés are just around the corner. The wifi is fast and the apartment works fine as a homeoffice as well.

name: Sonniges großes Zimmer mit Balkon in bester Lage
description:
It's a maisonette flat with 2 floors, one floor is for you including a bathroom.
You have a super cozy room with plenty of space and a sunny balcony for a great Berlin experience. It's made with love and hopefully treated as such.
It's located in Kreuzkölln (Kreuzberg/Neukölln) just next to Maybachufer, one of the nicest areas of Berlin - if you like friendly people, bars, and lots of happenings outside.
This place is highly recommended for open minded, chill people who want to enjoy their time.

name: Boutique Apartment Room  Close to center
description:
Are you looking for a brand-new apartment in a family-friendly green area close to the city center ?
The hip kitchen invites you to prepare your meal using the premium kitchen ware.
The cozy terrace to enjoy your freshly prepared coffee in the morning sun.
Withdraw yourself to your tranquil room with a kingsize bed and fully electric sun-tight shades. The master bathroom offers you a rain shower, a relaxing bath tub and an avant-garde washing machine including a dryer

name: Apartment Motzstraße (1000) with separate bedroom
description:
The apartment appeals by its central situation near Nollendorfplatz. Kurfürstendamm as well as Tauentzienstraße, the largest shopping street of Berlin with the world-famous “KaDeWE”, can comfortably be reached on foot in about 10 – 15 minutes.

In the apartment there is a 55 inch Smart TV and DSL Internet access via WI-FI.

Please look forward to a quiet and modern 2-room apartment in an old building which is typical of Berlin with a view to the garden.

name: Stylish apartment in the center of Berlin
description: Stylish apartment in the center of Berlin. S-Bahn, supermarkets and cafes only few walking away. Despite the central location, it is very quiet. Stylish furnishings make the stay a special experience. With fiber optic internet connection (100 MBit) ideal for Netflix evenings or Zoom meetings during the day. Just arrive and get started.

name: Second Home in Friedrichsberg
description: Enjoy your stay in a beautiful guestroom, in one of Berlins up-coming districts with charming family neighbourhood flair next to urban buzzling nightlife in Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg. Chill in the Park-Aue, discover Berlin history or experience experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity Berlin lifestyle. Easily accessible by public transport (U5, M13, M16, S41, S42)

name: Bright room in modern flat for female guests only
description:
Bright, quit and cosy room of my duplex apartment. The room is around 18 qm² big. It is equipped with a bed of 140cm size, an arm chair, a side board and several coat hooks. With closed windows and blinds the room is super quit and you can sleep in. You will have your private bathroom with a shower.
I also live in the Appartement so we will be sharing the kitchen and living area. I am happy to give you tips and help you get along in the area quickly.

name: Central, cosy, quiet &  near main sights + museums
description:
My place is very close to all major sights with an abundance of cafés and restaurants but in the quiet setting of the garden house with lovely green views and very high ceilings
Alexanderplatz, Kollwitzplatz and Winskiez are just a short walk. Public transit is just 2 minutes from the building.

Great for Solo adventurers or work nomads
You'll find everything you need for a memorable and comfortable stay in Berlin
I'm here to answer any questions you have or help with anything you might need 😊

description:
Comfortable, spacious and bright room, facing a beautiful garden and with a comfy double loft-bed.
The room is full of plants and has a desk for work, shelves for your clothes, a large mirror and a floor-mattress to hang out on.
The room is on a 3-bedrooms apartment.
You will have one of the rooms entirely for yourself and will be sharing the flat with two lovely flatmates (a man and a woman), a massage therapist and a graphic designer.
Your room has its own key.

name: Central Charm, City Comfort - long-term stay
description:
Hello I'm Anna Maria a real Berliner and I would love to Welcome you.

Your private space in this 2-room apartment is beautifully designed for your comfort and enjoyment. With a cozy queen bed, a comfy sofa for relaxation, and a TV for your entertainment. Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi and make use of the convenient table for any work or personal activities.

Your room comes with its own key, allowing you to lock the door and secure your belongings.

name: Schöne Altbau-Wohnung @ Schillerkiez /T-Feld/58qm
description: Beautiful, comfortable 2-room apartment on the 4th floor (no lift) in the most fancy neighbourhood of Neukölln (lots of restaurants, bars and shops). With a great public transportation link close by. The flat has a spacious kitchen with a beautiful wooden floor, a bathroom, a bedroom and a big living room and a balcony. The surface is 56,5 m2.

name: Newly renovated Studio in Mitte
description:
Hello,

My fully equipped, newly renovated studio is located in the heart of Berlin (5 mins from Central Station). Ideal for visitors searching for a stylish place to stay while exploring Berlin or for someone looking for a short term accommodation.

- Queen sized Loft bed / Hochbett (140x200cm)
- Shower room (incl. washer-dryer)
- Kitchenette (stovetop & microwave), refridgerator

**** There is scaffolding on our building but construction work is paused until Oct'24. See further details below ***

Live like a local in this lovely, modern mini studio. The studio is a well designed 10m² with lots of natural light, private bathroom with rainshower, comfortable double bed 140x200cm, work space, and kitchenette. It’s the perfect peaceful spot for a single guest or a couple looking for a quiet retreat — and is ideally situated to explore the best of Berlin.

name: Spacious, Bright Flat by Mauerpark–Modern & Quiet!
description:
Spacious, bright and modern flat with 3 bedrooms, two with double beds and the third with a single bed and a (optional) folding bed. Big, open and fully equipped kitchen and living room, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, floor heating, dishwasher, washing mashine, TV, WIFI. The flat is on the 4th floor with a lift.

Located right in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, Mauerpark is just outside the front door. Quiet street, with lots of nice restaurants and cafes. 10min to Alexanderplatz with U-Bahn.

description:
Our large penthouse is spread over 3 floors, with lots of light, and 3 terraces to enjoy fresh air and Berlin views. The main floor is a 75sqm open space with the kitchen, breakfast, dining and, living areas, as well as a second bathroom.
Kick back and relax in front of the fireplace, or start up the home cinema and enjoy a movie.
The lower floor has 3 main bedrooms, a large new bathroom and a second entrance to the apartment. The mezzanine includes a double bed, small lounge and a work area.

name: 2 Charming 2 Room Apartment in Berlin Mitte
description:
This charming apartment in the heart of Berlin is surrounded by restaurants, cafes, shops, galleries and museums, yet quiet. It is lovingly planned and furnished.

The apartment can accommodate 4 people. The bedroom is small but has a 160x200 double bed.

The living room is equipped with a cosy sitting corner including a 140x200 sleeping sofa. Please know the sofa is not as comfortable as a propper bed.

We finally got an elevator!

The way to metro, bus and tram stations is short.

You are going to live with me and my boyfriend. We are going to share the livingroom, bathroom and kitchen.

description: The apartment is about 100 square meters. It consists of a bedroom, a study equipped with a couch and a large (about 40 square meters) kitchen-living room. name: Spacious apartment in Mitte
description:
This two room apartment (65 sqm) is located in the heart of of Berlin Mitte. Refurbished in 2015, it combines the charm of an old building with modern furniture and equipment.

Stylish furniture, large and cozy living room with big windows, fully equipped kitchen, large bedroom with blackout curtains, 4m+ ceilings and a small sunny balcony.

WIFI, TV with Netflix & Amazon Prime, Sonos Speakers. Perfectly suited for two people. Additional guests can sleep on mattresses.

name: Friedi's Studio, 15 min. to the Brandenburg Gate
description:
In the beautiful apartment (1 room, kitchen, bathroom, 36m²) in the north of Berlin, district Pankow-Wilhelmsruh all guests are welcome. A travel cot for a toddler up to 3 years old and a high chair are also available.
The convenient location near the S-Bahn station Wilhelmsruh (300 m) allows a very, very fast transport. Do not be fooled. You are in 15 min. at the Brandenburg Gate and can explore all Berlin very well.
Supermarkets EDEKA and NORMA, restautants, bakers etc. 300m.

description: This cozy apartment is located on of the most beautiful islands of Berlin, the Fischerinsel. Its location is in the middle between the most interesting neighborhoods of the city Mitte and Kreuzberg. The apartment is fully equipped with all you might need. In a few minutes walk you can be able to reach the famous TV tower of Berlin, the historical Berlin Dom and the museums' island. In the same street as the building, the is a supermarket and a pharmacy.

name: Elegant room in a stylish house in Berlin
description:
Cozy private room with shared bathroom near S-Bahn Storkower Str.

The house is only an 8-minute walk from S-Bahn Storkower Str. and a 15-minute walk from Frankfurter Tor. Guests have access to a kitchen as well as the balcony. There are three toilets and two bathrooms in the house.

Important information:
My friend Jules and one more guest also live in the house. I sometimes give piano lessons in the living room.

ONLY for FEMALE* travelers (FLINTA)

Welcome to our home in Berlin Friedrichshain! We are a queer and international female household with a cat and value respectful co-living.
Please read through our house-rules before sending us a request! Thank you.

name: Wunderschöne Wohnung im Herzen von Berlin-Mitte
description: Stylishly furnished 2-room apartment in the heart of Berlin-Mitte, near Rosenthaler Platz. Located at the garden house, all windows of this apartment look out into the backyard. Absolutely quietly located, you are nonetheless in the center of Berlin, with all stores for daily needs and public transport in the immediate vicinity. An abundance of good restaurants and bars, Museum Island and much more are within walking distance. The apartment is approved for guest rental by the Berlin Senate.

name: Traumhafter Berliner Altbau
description: We have renovated and furnished our Berlin old building apartment in 2022 lovingly and stylishly. The apartment captivates with a modern high-quality fitted kitchen with everything you need to prepare a delicious meal and a modern bathroom with walk-in rain shower. Highlights of the apartment are also the exposed brick wall in one of the two spacious living rooms and the rough wall in the bedroom, which creates a contrast to the modern and high-quality furnishings.

name: 2 Rooms rooftop terrace Prenzlauer Berg Mauerpark
description:
2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom in a big modern family flat (living room, kitchen and terrace shared) on 2 levels. Big terrace (40m2). Wonderful view.
Kastanienallee, Mauerpark, Kollwitzplatz, Alexanderplatz, Kulturbrauerei, flea market , little Boutiques, bars, restaurants and clubs around.
12 minutes tram from central station. Metro U2 Eberswalder Strasse is 5 minutes walk.
You will share the living room, kitchen and terrace with our family (sometime we have a dog with us)

name: Colorful design 2room + balcony next Maybachufer
description:
A whole charming ~70 sqm apt perfectly situated between Neukölln and Kreuzberg ("Kreuzkölln"): plenty of restaurants, bars and coffee places right in front. Weekly markets and parks less than 5 mins walking. Plus some designer classics...
Note: this is a child and pet friendly apartment!

I've been with Airbnb since 2014 - with a rating constantly above 4.9 out of 5. And most importantly: I have never canceled a guest's reservation - and will never ever do.

IMPORTANT! We have two little cute cats, no freebies - so they will be in the apartment all the time. Please only ask the apartment if that's okay.

The quiet apartment in a former jam factory was furnished in January 2012 with love and a secure sense for beautiful interior. Relaxed beach bars, trendy clubs and good restaurants are around the corner.  Countless real Berlin pubs are open all night and for the appetite in between there are snack bars with doner kebab, pizza and homemade burgers of the first quality. It is five minutes to the Künstlerhaus Betanien, ten minutes to the “Badeschiff”, a swimming pool with a pontoon floating on the Spree, from which you can admire large passing ships. Feel at home!

Thus, you are in the middle of the Big City in a short time, and the location also offers the opportunity to relax.

The apartment is 60 square meters and can be supplemented next to a bed in the bedroom (140 cm) with a guest bed (150 cm) in the living room/kitchen-living room, see pictures.

description: Newly furnished, 1 bedroom apartment is located just north of Prenzlauer Berg in Pankow.  Sunny private terrace and public transport close by!

description:

The REWE is directly across the road (2 min) and everything else (organic shops, etc.) can be found on Greifswalder Straße. Also the S-Bahn station Greifswalder Straße (Ring) station is only a 7 minute walk away and the tram is even only 3 min away.

Just a few steps from S-Bahn, U-Bahn and bus lines with direct connection to Hauptbahnhof, Friedrichstraße, Alexanderplatz and Potsdam. Be enchanted by the charm of old Berlin!

This individual and spaceous apartment in Berlin's Neukölln district is the perfect base for some wonderful days in the city. Located within 10 minutes walking distance to the unique Tempelhofer Feld recreational area and located in one of the most vibrant areas of Berlin, this private flat will immediately make you feel home.

The flat is conveniently connected by public transport to the rest of the city and within 5 minutes walking distance from both U8 and Ringbahn (S41, S42, S45, S46).

The highlight of the apartment must be the spacious living room room (85m2) with uninterrupted views over the neighbouring building toward the famous Potsdamer Platz.

name: Oasis in KreuzbergNeukölln 93qm
description: Nestled between the popular Gräfekiez and Reuter Kiez, our centrally located apartment exudes style with designer furniture. Step outside, and you're in the heart of the city, surrounded by trendy restaurants, bars, cafes, and shops. Experience urban chic and the best of city life in this unique accommodation!

Perfect apartment for a city trip to Berlin!

Located right in the historic center of Mitte, within walking distance to major sights like the Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charly, Museum Island, Gendarmenmarkt, Potsdamer Platz and more—making it easy to explore Berlin.

The apartment features a separate bedroom, an open kitchen and living room (with a sofa bed), and a spacious bathroom.
